Dear Harry:
I am sending you a copy of the 1957 convention program.
The 19^8 convention will be held in Minneapolis, at the
Hotel Leamington, April 18 - 2U.
I have looked through the 19f>7 program and find your
name listed only one place - as a member of the Radio
and Recordings Committee, in relation to their committee
meeting. As I recall Kitty told me that you were plannÂ¬
ing to attend the convention if at all possible. This
was probably the reason that your name was not omitted
from the committee listing. I assume that Mr. Bell sent
a letter of thanks to all those whose name appeared in
the program. The national office sent letters of thanks
only to those who registered. I regret this error.
